statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT dosage, usage_date FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE medication_id = 200 AND effectiveness_rating > 3;
SELECT patient_id, dosage, usage_date FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE medication_id = 300 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE effectiveness_rating < 2;
SELECT dosage, effectiveness_rating FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT dosage, usage_date FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE medication_id = 3 AND effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_id, SUM(effectiveness_rating) AS total_rating FROM patient_medication_usage GROUP BY patient_id, medication_id;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT MAX(effectiveness_rating) AS max_rating, MIN(effectiveness_rating) AS min_rating FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE dosage IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, effectiveness FROM medications WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.name, m.medication_name FROM patients p JOIN medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.effectiveness = 'High' ORDER BY p.name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 40 AND 50;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.medication_name, m.dosage FROM patients p JOIN medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY p.patient_id ASC, m.medication_name ASC;

SELECT p.name, COUNT(m.medication_id) AS medication_count FROM patients p LEFT JOIN medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING COUNT(m.medication_id) > 3 ORDER BY medication_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_history WHERE date_prescribed > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_prescribed ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, effectiveness_rating FROM patients p JOIN medication_history mh ON p.patient_id = mh.patient_id JOIN medications m ON mh.medication_id = m.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';

SELECT patients.patient_name, medications.medication_name, medication_history.date_prescribed FROM patients JOIN medication_history ON patients.patient_id = medication_history.patient_id JOIN medications ON medication_history.medication_id = medications.medication_id;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 10 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM medication_history WHERE date_prescribed BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT prescription_id, dosage FROM Prescriptions WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Patients.name, Prescriptions.dosage FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT Medications.name, MedicationHistory.effectiveness_rating FROM Medications JOIN MedicationHistory ON Medications.medication_id = MedicationHistory.prescription_id;

SELECT Patients.name, Prescriptions.dosage, Medications.name FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, log_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN EffectivenessLogs ON Patients.patient_id = EffectivenessLogs.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM UsageLogs INNER JOIN AdverseEvents ON UsageLogs.patient_id = AdverseEvents.patient_id AND UsageLogs.medication_id = AdverseEvents.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, UsageLogs.usage_date FROM Patients JOIN UsageLogs ON Patients.patient_id = UsageLogs.patient_id JOIN Medications ON UsageLogs.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT AVG(dosage_taken), COUNT(*) FROM UsageLogs GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, UsageLogs.usage_date FROM Patients JOIN UsageLogs ON Patients.patient_id = UsageLogs.patient_id JOIN Medications ON UsageLogs.medication_id = Medications.medication_id WHERE UsageLogs.dosage_taken > 5;
